Posts.EditableText: I would like to see the in debugging. Either it is a problem in my game, or I cannot view lists in the debugger.
Posts.HTML: I would like to see the in debugging. Either it is a problem in my game, or I cannot view lists in the debugger.

Posts.EditableText: You can see lists in the debugger. Any object attribute which is a list will be displayed. For example, look at "displayverbs" - it will be something like "List: Look at; Take".
Posts.HTML: You can see lists in the debugger. Any object attribute which is a list will be displayed. For example, look at "displayverbs" - it will be something like "List: Look at; Take".
